megatron Revived:
 
A bit worried, he hurries out of the cave and heads off to his base again.  Though his speed is hindered, by his cargo, and a storm that currently raged over much of japan.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Blacknightmare:

Blacknightmare didn't answer, she was so tired and so deeply sleep


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
>
> Megatron Revived:  
>  
> Upon arriving at the area where he detected the signal, he 
transformed and landed, rushing inside the cave in search of the 
signal's source.  He rushed deep intothe cave, and finally found 
her, he stooped down and scooped her up.
>  
> "Blacknightmare?  Are you alright?"
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Blacknightmare:
> 
> 
> 
> Blacknightmare came inise a cave, she was exausted. Her energy 
> levels was low and she would need to eat something before she 
return 
> to her search of MEgatron and her sister.
> 
> She lied on floor and soon she was deeply sleep, not caring if 
some 
> one else could pick her signal or not.
>
